SEARCH
Package it.polimi.ingsw.view.GUI.Components.PawnRelated

Class PlateauMapping

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.view.GUI.Components.PawnRelated.PlateauMapping
public class PlateauMapping extends Object
The PlateauMapping class is responsible for managing the mapping of pawn positions on the plateau. It provides the coordinates for pawns based on their positions and colors and handles conflicts by applying offsets.

  • Method Details

    • getPositionCoordinates

      public static javafx.util.Pair<Integer,Integer> getPositionCoordinates(int position, PawnColors color, boolean isConflicting)
      Returns the coordinates for the given position and pawn color. If there is a conflict, applies an offset based on the pawn color to avoid overlap.
      Parameters:
      position - the position on the plateau.
      color - the color of the pawn.
      isConflicting - whether there is a conflict with another pawn.
      Returns:
      the coordinates for the pawn on the plateau.
